Dialogue: Hey D’artem how’s your school break treating yah?
I’ve never seen you with such an appetite.
Mostly because mom won’t let me eat like this, but today is my cheat day hehe.
I’m sure it wouldn’t hurt to treat yourself now and then. I oughta get me some food while there is still some left hehe.
Anyways I’ve noticed you’ve painted your little paper flower.
Yeah I wanted it to look pretty at least before giving it to my Mom.
